member.name: T:Xbox.Music.EntryBase
member.summary: The base object from which the main Xbox Music types inherit.

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.EntryBase.GetImage(System.Int32,System.Int32,Xbox.Music.ImageResizeMode,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a resized image based on the formatting criteria allowed by the Xbox Music service.
member.param: Image width in pixels.
Image height in pixels.
The mode with wich to resize the image.
HTML-compliant color for letterbox resize mode background. Hex values must start with a #. Can also use color names, such as "green". Defaults to an empty string.
member.returns: A string with the URL for the requested image specifications.

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.EntryBase.GetDeepLink(Xbox.Music.LinkAction)
member.summary: Creates a link that opens the platform's Xbox Music app with the specified view.
member.param: The view to open for this particular entity.

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.EntryBase.GetDeepLink(System.String,Xbox.Music.LinkAction)
member.summary: Creates an Affiliate link that opens the platform's Xbox Music app with the specified view.
member.param: The AffiliateID assigned to you by LinkSynergy.
The view to open for this particular entity.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.EntryBase.Id
member.summary: Identifier for this piece of content. All IDs are of the form {namespace}.{actual identifier} and may be used in lookup requests.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.EntryBase.Name
member.summary: The name of this piece of content.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.EntryBase.ImageUrl
member.summary: A direct link to the default image associated with this piece of content.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.EntryBase.Link
member.summary: A music.xbox.com link that redirects to a contextual page for this piece of content on the relevant Xbox Music client application depending on the user's device or operating system.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.EntryBase.OtherIds
member.summary: An optional collection of other IDs that identify this piece of content on top of the main ID. Each key is the namespace or subnamespace in which the ID belongs, and each value is a secondary ID for this piece of content.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.EntryBase.Source
member.summary: An indication of the data source for this piece of content. Currently only "Catalog" is supported.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Album.ReleaseDate
member.summary: Nullable. The album release date.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Album.Duration
member.summary: Nullable. The album total duration.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Album.TrackCount
member.summary: Nullable. The number of tracks on the album.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Album.IsExplicit
member.summary: Nullable. True if the album contains explicit content.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Album.LabelName
member.summary: The name of the music label that produced this album.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Album.Genres
member.summary: The list of musical genres associated with this album.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Album.AlbumType
member.summary: The type of album (for example, Album, Single, and so on).

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Album.Rights
member.summary: The list of distribution rights associated with this album in Xbox Music (for example, Stream, Purchase, and so on).

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Album.Artists
member.summary: The list of contributors (artists and their roles) to the album.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Artist.Genres
member.summary: The list of musical genres associated with this artist.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Artist.RelatedArtists
member.summary: An optional paginated list of related artists.
member.remarks: This list is null by default unless requested as extra information in a lookup request. Artists in this list contain only a few fields, including the ID that should be used in a lookup request in order to have the full artist properties.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Artist.Albums
member.summary: An optional paginated list of the artist's albums, ordered by decreasing order of release date (latest first).
member.remarks: This list is null by default unless requested as extra information in a lookup request. Albums in this list contain only a few fields, including the ID that should be used in a lookup request in order to have the full album properties.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Artist.TopTracks
member.summary: A paginated list of the artist's top tracks, ordered by decreasing order of popularity.
member.remarks: This list is null by default unless requested as extra information in a lookup request. Tracks in this list contain only a few fields, including the ID that should be used in a lookup request in order to have the full track properties.

member.name: T:Xbox.Music.ContentResponse
member.summary: The root object returned by the service.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.ContentResponse.Artists
member.summary: A paginated list of Artists that matched the request criteria.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.ContentResponse.Albums
member.summary: A paginated list of Albums that matched the request criteria.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.ContentResponse.Tracks
member.summary: A paginated list of Tracks that matched the request criteria.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.ContentResponse.Error
member.summary: Optional error.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Error.ErrorCode
member.summary: The error code, as described in the following table of error codes.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Error.Description
member.summary: A user-friendly description of the error code.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Error.Message
member.summary: A more contextual message describing what may have gone wrong.

member.name: F:Xbox.Music.ImageResizeMode.Scale
member.summary: Resize to maximum size which fits dimension without changing the aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Xbox.Music.ImageResizeMode.Letterbox
member.summary: Pad to dimension after resize if aspect ratio didn't match.

member.name: F:Xbox.Music.ImageResizeMode.Crop
member.summary: Get the required width and height but image is cropped.

member.summary: Specifies whether or not Top Tracks should be returned for each Artist.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.LookupOptions.GetAlbumArtistDetails
member.summary: Specifies whether or not Artist details should be returned for each Album.
member.remarks: Level of detail equivalent to a Lookup call on the .

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.LookupOptions.GetTrackAlbumDetails
member.summary: Specifies whether or not Album details should be returned for each Track.
member.remarks: Level of detail equivalent to a Lookup call on the .

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.LookupOptions.GetTrackArtistDetails
member.summary: Specifies whether or not Artist details should be returned for each Track.
member.remarks: Level of detail equivalent to a Lookup call on the .

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.TokenResponse.AccessToken
member.summary: The access token that you can use to authenticate you access to the Xbox Music RESTful API.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.TokenResponse.TokenType
member.summary: The data type of the token. Currently, Azure Marketplace returns http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2009/11/swt-token-profile-1.0, which indicates that a Simple Web Token will be returned.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.TokenResponse.ExpiresInSeconds
member.summary: The number of seconds for which the access token is valid.

member.name: F:Xbox.Music.LinkAction.View
member.summary: Default. Launches the content details view.

member.name: F:Xbox.Music.LinkAction.Play
member.summary: Launches playback of the media content.

member.name: F:Xbox.Music.LinkAction.AddToCollection
member.summary: Opens the "add to collection" screen on the Xbox Music service.

member.name: F:Xbox.Music.LinkAction.Buy
member.summary: Opens the appropriate purchase flow on the Xbox Music service.

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the MusicClient for a given ClientId and ClientSecret.

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.Find(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Allows you to find a // by a string query.
member.param: The term to search for.
The maximum number of results per page to return.
Specifies whether or not to include Artists in the results. Defaults to true.
Specifies whether or not to include Albums in the results. Defaults to true.
Specifies whether or not to include Tracks in the results. Defaults to true.
member.returns: A object populated with results from the Xbox Music service.
member.exception: This exception is thrown if you try to ask for more than 25 items.

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.Find(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to continue a previous search request.
member.param: The term to search for.
member.returns: A object populated with results from the Xbox Music service.
member.exception: This exception is thrown if you try to ask for more than 25 items.

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.Get(System.String,Xbox.Music.LookupOptions)
member.summary: Allows you to get an // by a known identifier.
member.param: The ID to search for. Must start with "music."
member.returns: A object populated with results from the Xbox Music service.

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.Get(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},Xbox.Music.LookupOptions)
member.summary: Allows you to get multiple Artists/Albums/Tracks by known identifiers.
member.param: A List of IDs to search for. Must start with "music."
Optional. A instance with details on what additional information should be returned.
member.returns: A object populated with results from the Xbox Music service.

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.Get(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to get an // by a known identifier, and the ContinuationToken from a previous request.
member.param: The ID to search for. Must start with "music."

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.Get(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.String)
member.summary: Allows you to get multiple Artists/Albums/Tracks by known identifiers, and the ContinuationToken from a previous request.
member.param: A List of IDs to search for. Must start with "music."
The PaginatedList.ContinuationToken from a previous request.

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.GetPopulatedRequest(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a new populated with the common values for every request.
member.returns: A new populated with the common values for every request

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.CheckToken
member.summary: Checks to see if the token needs to be acquired or refreshed. If the Token is null or invalid, it will block the calling method until the Token request completes. Otherwise it will be considered a proactive refresh and get an updated token in the background.

member.name: M:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.Authenticate
member.summary: Acquires a new AuthToken from Azure Access Control.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.ClientId
member.summary: The Client ID assigned to you from your Azure Marketplace account.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.ClientSecret
member.summary: The Client Secret assigned to you from your Azure Marketplace account.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.Language
member.summary: Optional. The two-letter standard code identifying the requested language for the response content. If not specified, defaults to the country's primary language.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.MusicClient.Country
member.summary: Optional. The standard two-letter code that identifies the country/region of the user. If not specified, the value defaults to the geolocated country/region of the client's IP address. Responses will be filtered to provide only those that match the user's country/region.

member.name: T:Xbox.Music.PaginatedList`1
member.summary: Some of the methods in the Xbox Music RESTful API return lists of elements in their responses (for example, search results, albums of an artist, tracks of an album, and so on). These lists can potentially be very large, so we have put in place a mechanism to paginate these lists by using a continuation token. These lists and tokens are returned in a PaginatedList object.
member.typeparam: The type of item (inheriting from EntryBase) that comprises the List.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.PaginatedList`1.Items
member.summary: The items composing the paginated list.
member.remarks: When a list is of relatively small size, Items will contain the full list and ContinuationToken will be null. However, the list may be incomplete, which is indicated by the value of ContinuationToken.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.PaginatedList`1.ContinuationToken
member.summary: An opaque string that may be provided in a subsequent request to the same URL in order to continue the list.
member.remarks: If ContinuationToken is not null, then the list is not complete, and the token may be used to retrieve the remaining elements. A null value indicates that the list has no remaining items yet to be returned.

member.name: T:Xbox.Music.Track

member.summary: Nullable. True if the track contains explicit content.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Track.Album
member.summary: The album this track belongs to.
member.remarks: Only a few fields are populated in this Album element, including the ID that should be used in a lookup request in order to have the full album properties.

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Track.Artists
member.summary: The list of contributors (artists and their roles) to the album.

member.name: T:Xbox.Music.Contributor
member.summary: An individual or group who contributed work to an or .

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Contributor.Role
member.summary: The type of contribution, such as "Main" or "Featured".

member.name: P:Xbox.Music.Contributor.Artist
member.summary: The contributing artist.
